articles.title: Reception given to mark KPA birthday
Kimilsungia and Kimjongilia greenhouses visited
articles.content:
Kimilsungia and Kimjongilia greenhouses visited 
    Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Ambassador Milorad Kosovac and staff members of the Yugoslav embassy here visited the Kimilsungia greenhouse and the Kimjongilia greenhouse in the Central Botanical Garden on Tuesday on the occasion of the constitutional day of Yugoslavia.
 The visitors looked round Kimilsungias and Kimjongilias in full bloom, being told that those immortal flowers have come into being with the ardent wish of the progressive humankind following the great sun.

Foreign military attaches visit fine art exhibition
articles.content:
Foreign military attaches visit fine art exhibition 
    Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- The military attaches corps here yesterday visited the fine art exhibition that opened to mark the 69th anniversary of the Korean People's Army.
 They looked round fine art works depicting the immortal leadership exploits and noble traits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and the great communist revolutionary fighter Kim Jong Suk and showing the devoted struggle of the army and people intensely loyal to the party and leader.

Talks held between foreign ministers of DPRK and Laos
articles.content:
Talks held between foreign ministers of DPRK and Laos
    Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Talks between Paek Nam Sun, foreign minister of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, and Somsavath Lengsavath, deputy prime minister and foreign minister of the government of the Lao People's Democratic Republic, were held at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.
 At the talks both sides exchanged their views on developing the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries and a series of issues of mutual concern.    
 The talks proceeded in a friendly atmosphere.

articles.title: Kim Yong Sun meets chairman of Hyundai Asan of S. Korea
articles.content:
Kim Yong Sun meets chairman of Hyundai Asan of S. Korea
    Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Sun, chairman of the Korean Asia-Pacific Peace Committee, today met and conversed with Jong Mong Hon, chairman of the Hyundai Asan of South Korea, and his party in an atmosphere overflowing with  compatriotic feelings.
 Present there was Song Ho Gyong, vice-chairman of the committee.    
 The South Koreans left Pyongyang this day.
